backend/main.mo: Actor exposes deployApp with domain-name validation enforcing length and allowed characters, trapping on errors.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module returning state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking a deployment-domain feature to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components, utilities, and deployment-domain feature files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and shared element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app managing Valentine interactions and footer domain dialog.
frontend/src/features/deployment/Deploym: Dialog UI for entering, validating, and submitting a deployment domain to the backend.
frontend/src/features/deployment/validat: Validates domain strings for length and character rules, returning an error or null.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Renders Yes and fleeing No buttons hooking into user interaction handlers.
Displays success message once the user selects Yes.
Modal overlay prompting reconsideration when No is selected.
Canvas animation rendering floating, rotating heart shapes.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Hook calculating random button repositioning when the pointer approaches.
frontend/src/features/valentine/index.ts: Barrel export for Valentine feature components and hook.
frontend/src/features/valentine/utils/po: Provides helpers to get pointer coordinates, compute distances, and clamp numeric values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider with login, logout, and identity restoration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the Valentine app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine-themed color variables plus gradient and text utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, and Valentine theme extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, constraints, and current implementation state for the Valentine app.
